          <title>
            <string language="es">Observaciones sobre el uso del diccionario de griego</string>
            <string language="en">Comments on using a Greek dictionary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommentiert das Verwenden eines griechischen 
Verzeichnisses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commente utiliser un dictionnaire grec</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comenta em usar um dicionário grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commenta usando un dizionario greco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχόλια στη χρησιμοποίηση ενός ελληνικού λεξικού</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Con esta secuencia se dan instrucciones de cómo usar un diccionario escolar de griego.</string>
            <string language="en">This sequence gives instructions on how to use a school Greek dictionary.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="es">Griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">diccionario</string>

          </keyword>

            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Reihenfolge erteilt Anweisungen in, wie man
ein Schule Griecheverzeichnis benutzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet ordre donne des instructions sur la façon 
dont utiliser un dictionnaire de Grec d'école.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta seqüência dá instruções em como usar um
dicionário do grego da escola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa sequenza dà le istruzioni su come usare 
un dizionario del Greco della scuola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ακολουθία δίνει τις οδηγίες για το πώς να 
χρησιμοποιήσει ένα σχολικό ελληνικό λεξικό.</string>
          </description>
